body.name: Wireless Keyboard and Mouse Combo - Light Up Letters, Magnetic Wrist Rest, Rechargeable Ergonomic Keyboard with Retro Typewriter Round Keys, Backlit Mouse Set for Computer, Mac, PC, Laptop, Trueque

features: 👍COOL 7-COLOR BACKLIGHT - The wireless keyboard has 7 switchable backlights and an RGB mouse that automatically changes color. Light-up keycaps and letters help you to use it more easily in low light.
👍RETRO TYPEWRITER STYLE ROUND KEYCAPS - Vintage round keycaps look like a classical typewriter, bringing you a comfortable typing feeling & stable clicking touch.
👍DETACHABLE WRIST REST - The ergonomic ABS palm rest provides firm support that alleviates pressure on your wrist from typing at an elevated angle.

👍ONE KEYBOARD, TWO-SYSTEM LAYOUT - This light up keyboard is equipped with dual-system layouts suitable for both Mac and Windows. 6-button mouse with 3 DPI (800/1200/1600) and forward/backward functions will help you navigate the web faster and easier than ever before.

🔋LONG BATTERY LIFE - Rechargeable keyboard and mouse can be charged by supplied USB C charging cable. The smart auto-sleep function and on/off switches help you to save power. Leave for xxx, the keyboard goes to sleep, leave for xxx, the mouse will sleep.
🚀LAG-FREE, ENJOY WIRELESS FREEDOM - Plug and play, only one USB receiver for both keyboard and mouse! 2.4GHz wireless technology provides a stable and reliable connection up to 33ft without latency.
👍WIDE COMPATIBILITY - This backlit keyboard mouse combo works with your PC, Desktop, Laptop or Notebook. Compatible with Windows, Linux, Chrome and Mac.

There's a problem with my keyboard and mouse that I can't solve, what should I do? Find the Trueque support team immediately, we will be 100% responsible for each of our products and customers. How long does it take to enter sleep mode? Can I change this mode? If it is idle for 1.5mins, the keyboard will light off, if it is idle for 15mins, the mouse will enter sleep mode. This mode cannot be changed. Its purpose is to save power and extend the battery life. Simply press any button to wake it up. What does the package include? Does it come with batteries? Package include: wireless keyboard *1; wireless mouse * 1; USB receiver * 1; user manual *1. NOTE: batteries NOT included. Is there only one USB connector? YES, keyboard and mouse share ONE USB receiver. I have cats and children at home, and they often accidentally touch the keys on the keyboard. What should I do? The back of the keyboard and mouse are equipped with switch buttons, which can be turned off when not in use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works smoothly and has good range.
reviews.reviewText: The directions say that the USB connector is placed on top of the keyboard in the package. To save some trouble it is actually stored in the bottom of the mouse. Initially the connection from the USB connector was choppy and had a lot a dead zones. Make sure you try all USB ports on your device before returning. After moving to a USB 3.0 port (not sure if this type is specifically needed) it worked perfectly. No choppiness, lag or dead zones after hours of use. Also worked from other side of my room, approximately 10 feet away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good!
reviews.reviewText: Charge, plug in and go. I'm new to charheable keyboards, I already have a charging wire on my desk for other components, so this week work out fine.I do wish the over all keyboard was a little longer for a larger keyboard work area. I prefer keyboards that are not so compact, but this one gets the job done.I like the choices of light color for the keys, could be brighter though. Mouse is a great size, just have to get use to the buttons on the side. Overall, good value. love the click click sound

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars ASMR - Round and Clicky keys!
reviews.reviewText: I haven’t had this keyboard/mouse long enough yet to say I love it but I am definitely enjoying the red backlight and the round clicky keys. Also, the fact that it is a wired charge rather than batteries. The only caveat is that the mouse DOES NOT work on all surfaces. I have a black glass top desk and the mouse will not work without something underneath it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the look and the raised round keyboard, great for someone like me, who wears long nails. Love the different colors and that it's wireless with no batteries. I'm blind without my glasses so I wish the letters and numbers were larger on the keyboard, it tool me forever to find the FN button to change the colors and brightness but other than that, it's great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For the price getting a rechargeable keyboard and mouse it’s great.The backlight is barely noticeable and makes it difficult to see the keys if you are not familiar with key placement. I like the clickity clackity it makes.This is day one and 1 hour in sooo will update in a week.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I do have to say the first keyboard and mouse I received certainly did not stack up.. thankfully they took it upon themselves to send me another and I am glad they did.. this one seems to hold a charge much longer and the keys are not lagging like the first one. I am glad I had the opportunity to really see what the keyboard should perform like.. much better the second time around thank you

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this keyboard to avoid having to constantly change out a battery lol. So far, I LOVE it. It's not to loud as a keyboard and I love that it is backlit. Plus the auto shut off, Id say this is win for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy with my purchase
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been searching for a wireless keyboard and mouse combo for a while but it’s difficult to do online because I’m really picky about the sound and feel of the keyboard. I enjoy typing on my laptop but hate a traditional keyboard with raised keys. This keyboard has very low profile keys and quiet typing and the mouse is comfortable and quiet. I’m really glad I chose this combo. And the color is unique. I’ve gotten many compliments from my co-workers when they walk by and have shared the link with them.
